comments: His lectures are extremely boring he talks about finance and his investments and how he got to retire early every single class over and over you hear about his stocks which has nothing to do with the class or anything that will help you. I took a hybrid and I would not I would just take this class online if I could. I would not take him again.

Very Easy class, everything is written out week by week and he allows you to work ahead. Took online and by far the easiest most insightful class I\'ve taken at LCC. I highly suggest taking this class with him. Would be a good online summer class

He is a good teacher; but his area of interest is finance rather than business, and his teaching emphasizes money more than anything else. I took his class in the summer and there was just waaaay too much homework, but in a full semester it wouldn\'t seem like so much.
Awesome teacher online teacher. Homework is clear and direct. NO EXAMS! I would take him again.
He is a great guy! He will work with you. He knows his stuff when he\'s talking about investments! Take his class!

Do It. He makes no sense sometimes but helps you so much. If you dont get something BAM! Ill help you with it next class then you can turn it in the week after! And I mean seriously everything. Ive gotten 4 extensions, out of like 6 assignments. If it werent for him being so laid back I probably would have failed my other classes.

Gives the questions to the test as review. Some stuff he goes over will make no sense at all but that doesnt take away from class experience. If youre interested in the stock markt, its an excellent class to take and Eric makes learning about the stock market interesting and easy.
